title: Marijn Portegies
text:
Be precise. Prefer mechanisms to slogans.

Be fair. Represent opposing views in their strongest form.

Be useful. Write with the readerâ€™s future in mind.

Be revisable. Admit error quickly; reward evidence.

Background
Iâ€™m currently based in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, studying and working or seeking to work at the intersection of econometrics, policy, data and philosophy in a changing world.

title: A Letter to the Reader
text:
A Letter to the Reader

Dear reader,

This site is still taking shape.
In time, it will hold essays on economics, philosophy, politics, and culture, as well as small data-scientific plug-ins and experiments.
It exists mostly for myself â€” a way to keep writing, researching, and staying curious.
For now, it contains only my contact information. The rest will grow in its own time.

â€” Marijn
